#############################################
## To print out all sentences from the beam
## BEAM SIZE 100
#############################################

#### 1. Translate using original seq2seq model ####

## Baseline: Take top sentence generated by model
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64

bash ~/sockeye-recipes/scripts/translate.sh \
-p ~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/anon_glove_tokens.hpm \
-i ~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/data/newsela_Zhang_Lapata_splits/V0V4_V1V4_V2V4_V3V4_V0V3_V0V2_V1V3.aner.ori.test.src.aner \
-o /data2/text_simplification/output/reranked/tokens.100beam.top1 \
-e sockeye_gpu_57 \
-b 100 \
-t translation \
-n 0 \
-m 0 \
-s

## Translates and stores beam histories
bash ~/sockeye-recipes/scripts/translate.sh \
-p ~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/anon_glove_tokens.hpm \
-i ~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/data/newsela_Zhang_Lapata_splits/V0V4_V1V4_V2V4_V3V4_V0V3_V0V2_V1V3.aner.ori.test.src.aner \
-o ~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/output/tokens.history_100beam \
-e sockeye_gpu_57 \
-b 100 \
-t beam_store \
-n 0 \
-m 0 \
-s

## Converts beam histories to graph, and prints the sorted list of all completed paths
## for each input sentence
python3 ~/sockeye/sockeye_contrib/output_nbest/output_nbest.py \
-d ~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/output/tokens.history_100beam \
-o ~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/output/tokens.100best

#### 2. Cluster sentences ####

## Clusters and reranks the output of the beam
source ~/venvs/demo/bin/activate

python ~/sockeye-recipes/new_scripts/cluster_rerank/cluster.py \
/data2/text_simplification/embeddings/enwiki_dbow/doc2vec.bin \
~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/output/tokens.100best \
~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/data/newsela_Zhang_Lapata_splits/V0V4_V1V4_V2V4_V3V4_V0V3_V0V2_V1V3.aner.ori.test.deanonymiser \
20 \
~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/output/tokens.100beam.20centroids

#### 3. Rerank sentences ####

## Generates sentence complexity predictions for each centroid
source ~/venvs/demo/bin/activate
cd ~/sockeye-recipes/new_scripts/predict_sentence_level/CNN-sentence-classification-pytorch-master/

python3 ~/sockeye-recipes/new_scripts/predict_sentence_level/CNN-sentence-classification-pytorch-master/run_preds.py \
--mode test \
--model non-static \
--datafile /data1/reno/newsela_splits/newsela_sents \
--epoch 20 \
--gpu 0 \
--cands ~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/output/tokens.100beam.20centroids \
--outfile ~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/output/tokens.100beam.20centroids.preds \
--early_stopping

## Rerank based only on perplexity
python ~/sockeye-recipes/new_scripts/cluster_rerank/rerank_2.py \
/data2/text_simplification/embeddings/enwiki_dbow/doc2vec.bin \
/data2/text_simplification/models/lm/lm-merged.kenlm \
~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/output/tokens.100beam.20centroids.preds \
~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/output/tokens.100beam.20centroids \
~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/data/newsela_Zhang_Lapata_splits/V0V4_V1V4_V2V4_V3V4_V0V3_V0V2_V1V3.aner.ori.test.src \
1 0 0 \
/data2/text_simplification/output/reranked/tokens.100beam.top1reranked_perplexity

## Rerank based only on simplicity
python ~/sockeye-recipes/new_scripts/cluster_rerank/rerank_2.py \
/data2/text_simplification/embeddings/enwiki_dbow/doc2vec.bin \
/data2/text_simplification/models/lm/lm-merged.kenlm \
~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/output/tokens.100beam.20centroids.preds \
~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/output/tokens.100beam.20centroids \
~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/data/newsela_Zhang_Lapata_splits/V0V4_V1V4_V2V4_V3V4_V0V3_V0V2_V1V3.aner.ori.test.src \
0 1 0 \
/data2/text_simplification/output/reranked/tokens.100beam.top1reranked_simplicity

## Rerank based only on relevancy
python ~/sockeye-recipes/new_scripts/cluster_rerank/rerank_2.py \
/data2/text_simplification/embeddings/enwiki_dbow/doc2vec.bin \
/data2/text_simplification/models/lm/lm-merged.kenlm \
~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/output/tokens.100beam.20centroids.preds \
~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/output/tokens.100beam.20centroids \
~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/data/newsela_Zhang_Lapata_splits/V0V4_V1V4_V2V4_V3V4_V0V3_V0V2_V1V3.aner.ori.test.src \
0 0 1 \
/data2/text_simplification/output/reranked/tokens.100beam.top1reranked_relevancy

## Rerank based on perplexity, relevancy, and simplicity equally
python ~/sockeye-recipes/new_scripts/cluster_rerank/rerank_2.py \
/data2/text_simplification/embeddings/enwiki_dbow/doc2vec.bin \
/data2/text_simplification/models/lm/lm-merged.kenlm \
~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/output/tokens.100beam.20centroids.preds \
~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/output/tokens.100beam.20centroids \
~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/data/newsela_Zhang_Lapata_splits/V0V4_V1V4_V2V4_V3V4_V0V3_V0V2_V1V3.aner.ori.test.src \
1/3 1/3 1/3 \
/data2/text_simplification/output/reranked/tokens.100beam.top1reranked_even



#### 4. Automatic Evaluations ####

python ~/sockeye-recipes/SARI/sari.py \
-c ~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/data/newsela_Zhang_Lapata_splits/V0V4_V1V4_V2V4_V3V4_V0V3_V0V2_V1V3.aner.ori.test.src.aner \
-r ~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/data/newsela_Zhang_Lapata_splits/V0V4_V1V4_V2V4_V3V4_V0V3_V0V2_V1V3.aner.ori.test.dst.aner \
-s /data2/text_simplification/output/reranked/tokens.100beam.top1

python ~/sockeye-recipes/SARI/sari.py \
-c ~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/data/newsela_Zhang_Lapata_splits/V0V4_V1V4_V2V4_V3V4_V0V3_V0V2_V1V3.aner.ori.test.src \
-r ~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/data/newsela_Zhang_Lapata_splits/V0V4_V1V4_V2V4_V3V4_V0V3_V0V2_V1V3.aner.ori.test.dst \
-s /data2/text_simplification/output/reranked/tokens.100beam.top1reranked_perplexity

python ~/sockeye-recipes/SARI/sari.py \
-c ~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/data/newsela_Zhang_Lapata_splits/V0V4_V1V4_V2V4_V3V4_V0V3_V0V2_V1V3.aner.ori.test.src \
-r ~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/data/newsela_Zhang_Lapata_splits/V0V4_V1V4_V2V4_V3V4_V0V3_V0V2_V1V3.aner.ori.test.dst \
-s /data2/text_simplification/output/reranked/tokens.100beam.top1reranked_relevancy

python ~/sockeye-recipes/SARI/sari.py \
-c ~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/data/newsela_Zhang_Lapata_splits/V0V4_V1V4_V2V4_V3V4_V0V3_V0V2_V1V3.aner.ori.test.src \
-r ~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/data/newsela_Zhang_Lapata_splits/V0V4_V1V4_V2V4_V3V4_V0V3_V0V2_V1V3.aner.ori.test.dst \
-s /data2/text_simplification/output/reranked/tokens.100beam.top1reranked_simplicity

python ~/sockeye-recipes/SARI/sari.py \
-c ~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/data/newsela_Zhang_Lapata_splits/V0V4_V1V4_V2V4_V3V4_V0V3_V0V2_V1V3.aner.ori.test.src \
-r ~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/data/newsela_Zhang_Lapata_splits/V0V4_V1V4_V2V4_V3V4_V0V3_V0V2_V1V3.aner.ori.test.dst \
-s /data2/text_simplification/output/reranked/tokens.100beam.top1reranked_even

## Compare files
paste ~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/data/newsela_Zhang_Lapata_splits/V0V4_V1V4_V2V4_V3V4_V0V3_V0V2_V1V3.aner.ori.test.src \
~/sockeye-recipes/egs/pretrained_embeddings/data/newsela_Zhang_Lapata_splits/V0V4_V1V4_V2V4_V3V4_V0V3_V0V2_V1V3.aner.ori.test.dst \
/data2/text_simplification/output/reranked/tokens.100beam.top1reranked_perplexity | less
